languages.text: Едва Лорд-капитан делает пару шагов, как {mf|его|ее} за рукав хватает Идира. Глаза псайкера расширены, а взгляд устремлен куда-то в пустоту.
As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
languages.original_text: Едва Лорд-капитан делает пару шагов, как {mf|его|ее} за рукав хватает Идира. Глаза псайкера расширены, а взгляд устремлен куда-то в пустоту.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

languages.text: En cuanto {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} da unos pocos pasos, Idira le agarra de la manga. Tiene los ojos como platos y mira a la nada.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} da unos pocos pasos, Idira le agarra de la manga. Tiene los ojos como platos y mira a la nada.

languages.text: 领主舰长刚刚走出几步，伊迪拉就抓住了{mf|他|她}的袖子。她的眼睛瞪得大大的，盯着太空。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长刚刚走出几步，伊迪拉就抓住了{mf|他|她}的袖子。她的眼睛瞪得大大的，盯着太空。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが数歩歩くとすぐ、イディラが{mf|彼|彼女}の袖を掴んだ。その目は大きく開き、宇宙を見つめている。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが数歩歩くとすぐ、イディラが{mf|彼|彼女}の袖を掴んだ。その目は大きく開き、宇宙を見つめている。

languages.text: Als der Lord Captain einige Schritte macht, packt Idira ihn am Ärmel. Ihre Augen sind groß und starren ins Leere.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

languages.text: À peine {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a-t-{mf|il|elle} fait quelques pas qu'Idira l'attrape par la manche. Ses yeux sont écarquillés et vitreux.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: À peine {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a-t-{mf|il|elle} fait quelques pas qu'Idira l'attrape par la manche. Ses yeux sont écarquillés et vitreux.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan birkaç adım atar atmaz İdira onun kolunu yakalıyor. Kocaman gözleriyle boşluğa bakıyor.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain takes a couple of steps, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} sleeve. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan birkaç adım atar atmaz İdira kolunu yakalıyor. Gözleri kocaman, boşluğa bakıyor.
